advantages.title: According to the project
advantages.firstDescription: The corpus can represent as many types of texts as possible in the language, and accordingly these texts are gradually included in the corpus. The quality of the corpus depends on the maximum increase in its number of words (hundreds of millions). The corpus database contains additional information in the form of annotations or annotations about the nature of the included texts. It collects information concentrated in one place. The corpus database is constantly improved and supplemented.
advantages.secondDescription: The national corpus is first necessary for the scientific study of the vocabulary and grammar of the language and the changes that have occurred in it over hundreds of years; Optimizes information search thanks to modern technological development; Facilitates the analysis, processing, and statistical data collection of large-scale materials; It will be possible to build the necessary dictionaries based on the corpus base, etc. National corpora are also important for teaching a language as a mother tongue or as a foreign language. In world languages, textbooks and curricula are now corpus-oriented. A foreigner, a school student, a teacher, a journalist, an editor and a writer can quickly and efficiently check the features of the use of an unfamiliar word or grammatical form using the corpus.
advantages.thirdDescription: The information system provides an opportunity to visualize data about dialect words and their use in different regions of Kazakhstan. It includes graphs, charts and maps that help the user better understand the regional distribution of dialects, their frequency of use and the dynamics of change over time. Data visualization makes dialect research accessible and visual.
advantages.fourDescription: The system provides interactive features that allow users to interact with the database of Kazakh dialects. This may include data search, filtering and sorting functions, as well as the ability to add new data or user comments. Interactive features make learning dialects fun and convenient, allowing users to contribute to the development of the system.

faq.firstQ: What can I do as a regular user on the platform?
faq.firstAn: As a user, you have access to search through our extensive database of dialect words, view statistics on dialect usage, and learn about the Kazakh language's rich variety.
faq.secondQ: What additional capabilities does a corrector have?
faq.secondAn: Correctors play a crucial role in maintaining the accuracy of our database. They can add new words, suggest edits to existing entries, and delete inaccuracies. They also have the ability to view detailed statistics to help guide their corrections.
faq.thirdQ: As an admin, how do I manage user roles on the platform?
faq.thirdAn: As the admin, you can assign and manage roles for users through the control panel. This includes granting corrector roles to trusted users and overseeing all changes made to ensure the integrity of the database.
faq.fourQ: How can I contribute to the database if I have a new dialect word or correction?
faq.fourAn: If you have a contribution, you can submit it for review through our interactive interface. As a regular user, your submission will be reviewed by a corrector, while correctors have the ability to make live changes to the database.
